holidays.title: Star Wars Day
holidays.description: It's party time on Tatooine. May the Forth be with you!

holidays.title: 45 Day
holidays.description: Get your records out, spin that turntable, and let’s travel back in time.

holidays.title: Anti-Bullying Day
holidays.description: Let’s pledge to listen, offer support, and pay closer attention to bullied children everywhere.

holidays.title: Beer Pong Day
holidays.description: Bottoms up! Beer Pong Day is here.

holidays.title: Childhood Stroke Awareness Day
holidays.description: Pediatric strokes are rare but they happen nonetheless. Learn more and take action now.

holidays.title: Dave Brubeck Day
holidays.description: Let us honor Dave Brubeck, the quiet man of jazz and the marvel of his craft.

holidays.title: Firefighters' Memorial Day
holidays.description: Let’s join in honoring those who make the ultimate sacrifice in the line of duty.

holidays.title: Greenery Day
holidays.description: Join us as we express our gratitude to Mother Nature this Greenery Day!

holidays.title: Greenery Day (Midori no Hi)
holidays.description: Join us as we express our gratitude to nature this Greenery Day!

holidays.title: Herb Day
holidays.description: Let’s get those seeds ready, we’re going herb planting!

holidays.title: International Drone Day
holidays.description: On International Drone Day, learn about the evolution of drone use over time!

holidays.title: International Firefighters Day
holidays.description: Today is International Firefighters Day. Remember that while fire is useful, fire safety is critical.

holidays.title: International Respect for Chickens Day
holidays.description: Let us act now to stop the pain and abuse suffered by the chickens on farms.

holidays.title: Join Hands Day
holidays.description: Work for the betterment of society by joining hands with the old and the new.

holidays.title: K.I.N.D. Day
holidays.description: A baby's hygiene starts with a diaper, so let's band together to raise awareness!

holidays.title: Kent State Shootings Remembrance
holidays.description: Continue reading for more information on the largest student protests in U.S. history.

holidays.title: Kentucky Derby
holidays.description: The Kentucky Derby is also known as the ‘Most Exciting Two Minutes in Sports.’

holidays.title: Martyrdom of Imam Sadeq
holidays.description: Today we appreciate and reflect on Islamic history as we observe the Martyrdom of Imam Sadeq.

holidays.title: Naked Gardening Day
holidays.description: Put away all your clothes and get your shovel ready for World Naked Gardening Day!

holidays.title: National Bombshell Day
holidays.description: National Bombshell Day was created to highlight the importance of spreading self-love and love among women.

holidays.title: National Candied Orange Peel Day
holidays.description: Get ready to satiate your sweet tooth with our great tips for candied orange peels!

holidays.title: National EOD Day
holidays.description: This day honors E.O.D. specialists, so let's delve deeper into its history and facts.

holidays.title: National Fitness Day
holidays.description: Make your move to stay fit on National Fitness Day.

holidays.title: National Herb Day
holidays.description: Wondering how National Herb Day came into being? We are here to shed some light.

holidays.title: National Kids Fitness Day
holidays.description: Physical fitness ought to be a key component of every child’s daily routine.

holidays.title: National Orange Juice Day
holidays.description: Get your juicers out and celebrate all things orange juice with our great tips!

holidays.title: National Remembrance Day in Netherlands
holidays.description: Today we join the Dutch in commemoration of all fallen civilians and soldiers — casualties of war.

holidays.title: National Renewal Day
holidays.description: It’s out with the old and in with the re-new-al as we mark National Renewal Day.

holidays.title: National Scrapbook Day
holidays.description: Scrapbooks, at the end of the day, are much like visual diaries.

holidays.title: National Scrapbooking Day
holidays.description: Unleash your creative side and start scrapbooking with styles from minimalist to bold and bright.

holidays.title: National Start Seeing Monarchs Day
holidays.description: Get your binoculars ready and come see some monarch butterflies with us!

holidays.title: National Weather Observers Day
holidays.description: Dust off your weather-watching equipment, it’s time to celebrate Weather Observers Day!

holidays.title: Petite and Proud Day
holidays.description: If you’re below 5’4” and struggle to reach high surfaces, this day is for you.

holidays.title: Pilates Day
holidays.description: Pilates Day celebrates using this form of exercise to improve general health and quality of life.

holidays.title: Relationship Renewal Day
holidays.description: Today is the perfect day to reach out to that person you’ve lost touch with.

holidays.title: Rhode Island Independence Day
holidays.description: What makes Rhode Island unique among other states? Let us find out!

holidays.title: The 1940 Centennial
holidays.description: Raise your glass in cheers to another 100 years of excellence in New Zealand.

holidays.title: Wildfire Preparedness Day
holidays.description: Get together on this day and take action to reduce the risks of wildfire.

holidays.title: World Ankylosing Spondylitis Day
holidays.description: More than three million people in the U.S. are living with Ankylosing Spondylitis.

holidays.title: World Give Day
holidays.description: Take part in the joy of giving with people across the globe on World Give Day.

holidays.title: Yom HaShoah
holidays.description: Yom HaShoah brings with it garlands of determination and strength amidst tales of suffering.

holidays.title: Audrey Hepburn’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s remember and honor Audrey Kathleen Hepburn — “the personification of natural beauty.”

holidays.title: Navia Robinson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Where it all started for Navia Robinson, where her career is now, and everything in between!

holidays.title: Noah Beck’s Birthday
holidays.description: Noah Beck, the boy-next-door who’s stealing hearts all over TikTok, is our focus today.

holidays.title: PrestonPlayz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s enter the world of PrestonPlayz and see how he amassed millions of dollars and fans!
